title: CONTEST! Win A Pair of ROTOR Carbon Aldhu Cranks!
content:
Lighter, stiffer, and fully modular…what’s not to like? ROTOR claims that their carbon Aldhu cranks and rings, in the 172mm, 52/36 combo weigh in at 523g! Combined with INspider power meter, it’s the winning combo for Qhubeka Assos in multiple stages of the Giro. ROTOR’s lightest crank ever, the arms alone are just 260g! Not

The post CONTEST! Win A Pair of ROTOR Carbon Aldhu Cranks! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Ron Frazelle
